function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited studies on SARS-CoV-2 inactivation","Impact":"Lack of understanding of effective disinfection methods for SARS-CoV-2","Mitigation":"Conduct extensive research on the inactivation of SARS-CoV-2 using various disinfection methods","Technologies":"Advanced disinfection technologies such as UV irradiation, chlorine, and chlorine dioxide","People":"Researchers, scientists, and public health professionals","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Prolonged survival of SARS viruses in hospital wastewater and waste","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission and contamination in healthcare settings","Mitigation":"Implement effective disinfection protocols for hospital wastewater, stool, and urine","Technologies":"Disinfection technologies such as chlorine and chlorine dioxide","People":"Hospital administrators, healthcare workers","Owner":"Healthcare facilities, environmental health departments"},{"Description":"Variable efficiency of ozone disinfection","Impact":"Potential ineffective disinfection of SARS-CoV-2 in certain environments","Mitigation":"Evaluate and optimize ozone disinfection methods for SARS-CoV-2 inactivation","Technologies":"Advanced ozone disinfection technologies","People":"Environmental engineers, disinfection technology experts","Owner":"Environmental consulting firms, research institutions"}]}
